abstract: In its first day of trading on Friday, the stock price of the newly combined Glencore Xstrata rose more than 4 percent, giving the company a market valuation of almost $70 billion.
snippet: In its first day of trading on Friday, the stock price of the newly combined Glencore Xstrata rose more than 4 percent, giving the company a market valuation of almost $70 billion.
lead_paragraph: 4:34 p.m. | Updated LONDON – Shares in Glencore Xstrata rose on their first day of trading on Friday, as investors banked on potential dividends and future cost savings from one of the largest deals in recent years.

headline.main: Glencore Shares Rise on Investor Optimism of Cost Savings
